mapper.select: SELECT sub.frno AS `no` , sub.parent_reply AS `parent_reply` , sub.content AS `content` , sub.write_date AS `write_date` , sub.writer_uno AS `writer_uno` , sub.writer_nick_name AS `writer_nick_name` , sub.writer_profile_pic AS `writer_profile_pic` , sub.like_num AS `like_num` , IF(( SELECT COUNT(frl.lno) FROM `feed_reply_like` frl WHERE frl.frno = sub.frno AND frl.uno = #{uno} ) > 0, true, false) AS `press_like` , IFNULL(( SELECT COUNT(fr.frno) FROM `feed_reply` fr WHERE fr.parent_reply = sub.frno ), 0) AS `reply_num` , ( SELECT `content` FROM `feed_reply_view` frv WHERE frv.parent_reply = sub.frno ORDER BY frv.like_num DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS `re_content` FROM ( SELECT * FROM `feed_reply_view` WHERE `fno` = #{no} AND `parent_reply` IS NULL ORDER BY `like_num` DESC LIMIT ${num} , 20 ) sub ORDER BY `like_num` DESC, `no`

SELECT sub.frno AS `no`, sub.parent_reply AS `parent_reply`, sub.content AS `content`, sub.write_date AS `write_date`, sub.writer_uno AS `writer_uno`, sub.writer_nick_name AS `writer_nick_name`, sub.writer_profile_pic AS `writer_profile_pic`, sub.like_num AS `like_num` , IF(( SELECT COUNT(frl.lno) FROM `feed_reply_like` frl WHERE frl.frno = sub.frno AND frl.uno = #{uno} ) > 0, true, false) AS `press_like` FROM ( SELECT * FROM `feed_reply_view` WHERE `parent_reply` = #{no} ORDER BY `like_num` DESC LIMIT ${num} , 20 ) sub ORDER BY `like_num` DESC, `no`
